title: Why Do People Like URF?
body: Yeah I get that its fun, but the only reason a team wins is because they'll have someone purely broken in Urf like Teemo, Hec, Graves, etc.

replies.body: It can be kind of fun because it is different. The problem is Riot is incompetent and can't do things properly.

Or because the players are actually good, instead of being QQing garbage that says "forfeit or AFK" at 7 minutes.
Playing with adult premades is amazing, try it sometime.

there are parts to this game people generally do not like.
cooldowns
mana
urf does not have.

cooldowns,
